SPARKLING WINE
PIPER SONOMA BRUT NV
Inspired by the
grand tradition of Piper-Heidsieck
Champagne, this cuvée of California-grown Chardonnay
and Pinot Noir expresses a fresh, feisty style all 1s
own. Spiral chains of tiny bubbles reveal the historic
bottle fermented
methode champenoise
кроссо
afforded to all truly fine sparkling wines. With a robust
toasty-apple bouquet and lingering yeasty-fig flavors,
riper sonoma brut is a dry, tart sparkier ready to
cheer everv festive occasion
WHITE WINE
JEKEL VINEYARDS ARROYO SECO
GRAVELSTONE CHARDONNAY 1994
Vineyards have been cultivated in the dry gravel soils
along the Arroyo Seco Creek since the 1830s - long
before the modern era of winegrowing in California's
Monterey County. It is there that Jekel Chardonnay
vines
produce
sumbtuous drv
whitewines
the 1994 vintage expressing a bold boxwood, apple
and pear bouquet, along with lingering flavors
of honey and toasty oak. Topping the wine's 1996 list
of accolades are a gold medal and Best of Show
at the Monterev Wine Competition. A truly delicious
dry white wine.
RED WINE
MIRASSOU MONTEREY
CABERNET SAUVIGNON 1992
The Mimsson family is America's oldest commerciall
winemaking heritage. Their 1992 Cabernet Sauvignon
is delicious, full-bodied dry red wine that exemplifies
the art and craft which has been the tradition at their
laroe Santa Clara Valley estate since 1854. A wine of
deep scarlet-ruby color, this Cabernet has a generous
honanet of black curmnts and tohacco leaves with
mature tannins and lingering cherry-cedar flavor
winning a gold medal at the 1906 New Worldl
International Wine Competition.
